read_data(parse_names=False)

Read data from a list of files found by read_folder. Takes the first column of the first file as the x-values. Filetype is specified in read_folder.

parse_namesbool

If True, parse file names for column headings

read_data_csv(path)

Read data from a single csv file

pathstr

Path to the csv file

read_echem_mpt(path, decimal=',')

Read cycling data from an echem mpt file If this is called multiple times, the data will be concatenated The data are resampled to the size of the data dataframe in self.generate_distance_matrix()

pathstr

Path to the mpt file

read_folder(root, filetype)

Read all files in a folder. Specify the filetype (e.g. h5, csv).

rootstr

Path to the folder.

filetypestr

File type to be read.
